item.title: I recieved this from no-reply@jagex.com
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Daniel™, post:20, topic:412299”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=513556.msg3728653#msg3728653 date=1314471437]

You use PHP to spoof the mail headers, it’s as simple as having a mail server and using php’s mail() function… it takes no skill and it definitely doesn’t mean they ‘hacked jagex’… :rolleyes:

Oh, I feel like a dumbass, but wait! Where did they get my email?

Is it, by chance, Daniel.dodson95@live.com?
[/quote]
No. It’s "Rockboydan2005@hotmail.com"[/quote]
Copy’s and pastes to Viagra mailing list

Thank you come again.
